title: Steps Watch Face
summary: Steps Watch Face with date, weather, steps counter and battery level indicator.
description: Steps Watch Face features:✔ Choose between colours✔ Analog clock✔ Date✔ Weather✔ Steps counter✔ Watch battery indicator✔ Phone battery indicatorCompatible with Round and Square smartwatches.Tested with LG G Watch R, LG Watch and MOTO 360.
descriptionHTML:
Steps Watch Face features:
✔ Choose between colours
✔ Analog clock
✔ Date
✔ Weather
✔ Steps counter
✔ Watch battery indicator
✔ Phone battery indicator

Compatible with Round and Square smartwatches.
Tested with LG G Watch R, LG Watch and MOTO 360.
comments: Crashes every time Crashes every time I try and set it as my watch face. Disappointing too, because according to the pics, it may have had everything I wanted. Moto 360 gen1.
wow So its having problems with showing me my phones' battery life and weather, I contacted dev and he told me its my issue. just wow
